string-array.name: description
string-array.item: Dar Hammuda Pasha was built by Hammuda Pasha Bey, a Muradid prince in 1630. The palace was the residence place
Dar Hammuda Pasha was built by Hammuda Pasha Bey, a Muradid prince in 1630. The palace was the residence place

string-array.name: description2
string-array.item: Balgha mezyena tbarkallah aleha echriwha aad tansewech
Balgha okhra mezyena zeda echriwhom zouz ok ?

resources.string: Dar Hammuda Pasha was built by Hammuda Pasha Bey, a Muradid prince in 1630. The palace was the residence place of Hammuda Pasha and his first wife
